Note: Set to true, the document section in case detail page will be hidden, otherwise it will be shown.
Set to true to deny upload (also delete) document after a case is done.
For switch on/off the display of the duration time in case details page.
Set to true to disable counting case in case list

| Set to true to enable filtering case owner when cases are queried. This setting affects all case 
| queries e.g. for case list, global search, statistic.
Default sort direction of case list
Default sort field of case list
Set this property to true to enable group chat function
Set this property to true to enable private chat function

| The set number controls the amount of tabs allowed with active chat. If more tabs are opened,
| the chat will be disabled in inactive tabs. Allowed values between 1-5

| Chat response timeout in seconds, default value is 0 and means no timeout. If chat messages go through 
| the reverse proxy Nginx, chat response timeout must be less than the Nginx timeout, e.g. less than 60 seconds.

| Client side timeout in minutes, must be more than 0 and less than the server side timeout (e.g. 25 seconds).
| Default value is 0, it means default client side timeout is applied.
| Default client side timeout is server side timeout minus 3 minutes.
Set to true to hide Statistic widget from homepage and application menu.
If this property is disabled, do not display user favorites section of process list in Portal home.
Activates the interactive user guide "first steps" in the portal at first login.
Set to true to enable date filtering with time. This setting affects on task list, case list, and statistics.
Set to true to hide hours and minutes next to date.
Set to true, year will be hidden, otherwise it will be shown.
A feedback message will be displayed after user finishes or leaves a task.

| This setting is using for SecurityMemberDisplayName component. If the SecurityMember is a role, set this setting to true to 
| list out all users of this role. If set to true, icon info is shown beside the role name.
Set to true to enable script checking for uploaded document. Currently this function supports checking for PDF, Excel, Word.
Set to true to enable virus scanner for uploaded document. Currently this function is using API VIRUSTOTAL.

Default value:
| doc, docx, xls,
| xlsx, xlsm, csv,
| pdf, ppt, pptx,
| txt, zip, jpg,
| jpeg, bmp, png
Note:
| Leave value empty if you allow all extensions. If just allow some extensions, list out extensions here,
| separated by comma. Example: pdf, txt, doc, docx.
Set to true to start a process/task in IFrame mode
Display the custom end page at the end of each Express process.
If true, case/task note does not display any system notes for non-administrator users.
If true, case/task note does not display any system notes for administrator.
If true, case note does not display any system tasks for non-administrator users.
If true, case note does not display any system tasks for administrator.

| To set the standard homepage which will be redirect to when clicking on home icon or logo.
| This setting also applies to the ends page after finished a task.
The option to show logged-in user format
The standard setting of default image that will be displayed in the image process list.
The standard setting of view mode in the process list.
Set to false to disable link to Show Information of process on Processes page (grid mode) and Case Details.
For switch on/off the display icons in button.
For switch on/off the display of environment information.
For switch on/off the display of the global search.
For switch on/off the display of the legacy UI.

Task list refresh interval in seconds.

Default sort field of task list
